analysis.description:
LescovexERC20.transfer (/unique_contracts/0x837b926e698a999eed00cf5001569d00ac23f6a8.sol#92-106) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > blockEndICO || msg.sender == owner) (/unique_contracts/0x837b926e698a999eed00cf5001569d00ac23f6a8.sol#93-96)

Lescovex.buy (/unique_contracts/0x837b926e698a999eed00cf5001569d00ac23f6a8.sol#260-269) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp < blockEndICO) (/unique_contracts/0x837b926e698a999eed00cf5001569d00ac23f6a8.sol#264)

Lescovex.LescovexAddr should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x837b926e698a999eed00cf5001569d00ac23f6a8.sol#172-174)
Lescovex.tokenUnit should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x837b926e698a999eed00cf5001569d00ac23f6a8.sol#179-181)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x837b926e698a999eed00cf5001569d00ac23f6a8.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (/unique_contracts/0x837b926e698a999eed00cf5001569d00ac23f6a8.sol#1): it allows old versions
